title: Epic 1.2: External API Access & Integration Planning
description: Secure access to external APIs and plan integration approach for live data in the AIFordable Groceries POC.

subtasks.title: Submit API key request through official MealMe website
Receive API key and review developer documentation
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: API key securely stored, team understands rate limits and authentication

subtasks.title: Test basic MealMe API connectivity
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Successfully make test API calls to verify access

subtasks.title: Document MealMe API capabilities and limitations
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Clear documentation of available endpoints, geographic coverage, data structure
